com.decoded.zool

Class ZoolSystemUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.decoded.zool.ZoolSystemUtil

  • public class ZoolSystemUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    A Utility for performing some important zool functions that are used in many places. This is a read only object and should not modify the Zool System in any way.

    • Constructor Summary

      • getInstanceToken

        public static byte[] getInstanceToken(java.lang.String hostUri)
        Generates an instance token for a host uri, and base64 encodes it. A new token value is generated each minute.
        Parameters:
        hostUri - the host uri, e.g. "localhost:9000"
        Returns:
        a byte[] for the new token generated.

      • getLocalHostUrlAndPort

        public static java.lang.String getLocalHostUrlAndPort(boolean isProd,
                                                      boolean isSecure,
                                                      ZoolConfig zoolConfig)
        Returns the DNS based identifier for this machine.
        Parameters:
        isProd - boolean
        isSecure - true if this is a secure host.
        zoolConfig - the current configuration being used with our zool connection
        Returns:
        a String that uniquely identifies this host in the service key cluster on zookeeper.

                                                                   boolean watch)
        Retrieve child nodes at the specified path safely.
        Parameters:
        zk - zookeeper
        path - the path
        watch - watch flag
        Returns:
        list of child node names
